description:
Classic cotton hoodie, classic comfort. There’s a lot to be said for reliable greatness, like your favourite order at the local coffee shop, the Box NSE hoodie is always what you want it to be.

  • Soft cotton blend uses recycled polyester to reduce weight and drying times
  • Raglan sleeves provide a great freedom of movement
  • Kangaroo pocket gets your hands out of the cold
  • Regular fit wears just like you want it to
name: The North Face Box NSE Pullover Hoodie - Women's
